thread.title: Early Facebook Investor Seeks Retail Investors With New Listing
thread.title_full: Early Facebook Investor Seeks Retail Investors With New Listing - WSJ

author: Simon Clark
title: Early Facebook Investor Seeks Retail Investors With New Listing
text:
HarbourVest Global Private Equity Ltd., an early investor in Facebook Inc., will start trading on the main section of the London Stock Exchange Wednesday, the latest attempt by a private-equity firm to attract individual investors.
The publicly traded fund, which first sold shares in 2007 targeting institutional investors, is managed by Boston-based HarbourVest Partners LLC, which has invested more than $25 billion in private equity...
